version_description:
5.3.5
Integration with Findo smart search

5.3.4
This interim release includes small improvements of OCR quality. Recently we added other cool features:
+TUTORIAL. The app now opens to introductory screens that help you learn about the functions and use them to the fullest.
+CHOOSE LANGUAGE FOR RECOGNITION. Now you can choose the language of the text not only when taking a picture, but also while cropping the captured image.
+ QR CODES. Now TextGrabber can recognize QR codes as well as text fragments in 60 languages. If a QR code contains a phone number, an e-mail address or a URL, you can immediately tap them to make a phone call, create an e-mail message or open the web page. All of the items grabbed from the QR code will be saved to History.
+ TAKE SNAPSHOTS WITH VOLUME UP/DOWN. Now you can take photos by pressing the Volume button on your device or headphones, as well as by tapping the camera button or just anywhere on the screen.

We are anxious to hear what you think of the new features! Please don’t be shy to share your feedback on TextGrabber pate in the App Store!

Added 12 new translation languages.

We are anxious to hear what you think of the new features! Please don’t be shy to share your feedback on TextGrabber pate in the App Store!

Dear users, thank you for your patience. TextGrabber is now completely compatible with iOS 10! We have added several improvements to make your work with printed texts effortless and effective.

Giving you the best user experience is a priority for us, and your review would be a great encouragement!

TextGrabber is now completely compatible with iOS 10! We have fixed some small bugs and added several improvements to make your work with printed texts effortless and effective.

Giving you the best user experience is a priority for us, and your review would be a great encouragement!

We’ve fixed some small bugs. Previously iOS 10 was fully supported in TextGrabber.
We are looking forward to your reviews and suggestions. Your feedback is very useful both to us, the developers, and to other users of the app.

We’ve fixed some small bugs. Previously iOS 10 was fully supported in TextGrabber.
We are looking forward to your reviews and suggestions. Your feedback is very useful both to us, the developers, and to other users of the app.

In this release, we've made some improvements to the app, fixing a number of minor bugs along the way, including in VoiceOver.
Please post your thoughts and ideas about TextGrabber on our AppStore page! Your feedback is very useful both to us, the developers, and to other users of the app.

We are excited to announce the completely new TextGrabber 6!
The new real-time recognition feature brings TextGrabber to an entirely new level. Try it now and leave a review, please!

With our innovative real-time OCR technology, you can capture text directly from your camera screen, without the need to take a photo and crop it. The digitized text instantly becomes actionable: it can be copied, edited, shared, translated into 100+ languages or read using VoiceOver. Links, phones, emails, street addresses and dates become clickable to easily perform the corresponding task – follow, call, email, find on maps or add to the calendar.

The UI has not been neglected either. TextGrabber has been redesigned in crisp green and white and the following improvements have been made:
• A “Save” button has been added to the results screen to enable you to save only the fragments you need.
• The camera can now be launched from the notes screen with the large convenient button.
• The “Share” dialog box has been replaced with a system one, where you can send the results to any app on your device.
• Photo OCR has also been given a complete overhaul to achieve faster OCR speeds and a smaller memory footprint.

Please leave a review if you like ABBYY TextGrabber 6.
Thank you!

In this release, we have improved the recognition of line and paragraph breaks as well as hyphenation of words, which helps preserve the original layout and makes the text much easier to read and translate.

Major since the previous release:

• With our innovative real-time OCR technology, you can capture text directly from your camera screen, without the need to take a photo or crop it. The digitized text instantly becomes actionable: links, phone numbers, email addresses, street addresses and dates become clickable to easily perform the corresponding task.
• The UI has not been neglected either. TextGrabber has been redesigned in crisp green and white.

Please leave a review if you like ABBYY TextGrabber 6. Thank you!

We’ve made some improvements and fixed small bugs. Major since the previous release:
+ Improved recognition of line and paragraph breaks as well as hyphenation of words, which helps preserve the original layout and makes the text much easier to read and translate.
+ Innovative real-time OCR technology let you capture text directly from your camera screen, without the need to take a photo or crop it.
We are looking forward to your reviews and suggestions. Your feedback is very useful both to us, the developers, and to other users of the app.

TextGrabber is now fully support iOS 11 and includes the most exciting features from new OS:
+ The Drag and Drop allows to quickly import images to TextGrabber for OCR and export recognized text to other apps (iPad only).
+ Language detection helps users get better recognition results. The app identifies the language of the scanned text and suggests it to the user.

Giving you the best user experience is a priority for us, and your review in AppStore would be a great encouragement for us!

+ Now you can turn off the app signature when sharing in the Settings.
+ Improved language detection algorithm helps users get better recognition results.

Major from last release:
+ Full support of iOS 11.
+ The Drag and Drop on iPad.
Please leave a review if you like ABBYY TextGrabber. Thank you!

We've made some improvements to the app, fixing a number of minor bugs.
Major from last release:
+ Ability to turn off the app signature when sharing in the Settings.
+ Improved language detection algorithm helps users get better recognition results.
+ Full support of iOS 11.
+ The Drag and Drop on iPad.
Please leave a review if you like ABBYY TextGrabber. Thank you!

We have made some improvements and bug fix.
Major changes introduced in past releases:
+ Ability to turn off the app signature when sharing in the Settings.
+ The Drag and Drop on iPad.
Please leave a review if you like ABBYY TextGrabber. Thank you!

In this release, we supported iPhone X interface so you can enjoy TextGrabber on your very new device!
Major changes introduced in past releases:
+ The Drag and Drop on iPad.
+ Ability to turn off the app signature when sharing in the Settings.
Please leave a review if you like ABBYY TextGrabber. Thank you!

We know that TextGrabber is widely used by users with visual problems, so we devoted this release to make our app better for them. In this release, we improved the performance of Voice Over in more than thirty cases! All camera elements, buttons, text of the note are voiced entirely without additional actions. Also, the real-time recognition mode was improved when Voice Over enabled.
Major changes introduced in past releases:
+ The Drag and Drop on iPad.
+ Ability to turn off the app signature when sharing in the Settings.
Please leave a review if you like ABBYY TextGrabber. Thank you!

In this release, we’ve fixed the work with text by merging pages (thanks to our attentive user!). Now, without any problems, you will be able to merge a hundred notes in one text. Also, auto-scroll was corrected when switching to a card from other windows and the application performance was improved.
Major changes introduced in past releases:
+ Improved Voice Over performance
+ The Drag and Drop on iPad.
+ Ability to turn off the app signature when sharing in the Settings.
Please leave a review if you like ABBYY TextGrabber. Thank you!

In this release, TextGrabber received the new Real-Time Translation functionality, which can translate to 100+ languages online and 10 languages offline. The app translates text of any color on any background directly on the camera preview screen eliminating the need to take a photo or crop it.
TextGrabber automatically identifies if the device has access to a stable Internet connection, and if so, uses it to deliver full-text translation into 100+ languages in real time.
If the device does not have Internet access, TextGrabber automatically switches to offline translation, which is essential for travel and everyday situations like understanding menus, street signs, labels, and more. Offline translation works for 10 common languages including English, Spanish, French, German, Brazilian, Indonesian, Portuguese, Russian, Chinese, and Japanese.
Try it now and leave a review, please! Thank you!

Personal data protection is a high priority for us. In this release, we made changes in the app in accordance with the new General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) in European Union law.
+ The Real-Time translation mode was improved when Voice Over enabled.

Major changes introduced in past releases:
+ Real-Time Translation can translate to 100+ languages online and 10 languages offline. The app translates the text of any color on any background directly on the camera preview screen eliminating the need to take a photo or crop it.

Try it now and leave a review, please! Thank you!

Try it now and leave a review, please! Thank you!

Meet the excellent and long-awaited novelties in this release!
+ Share Extention: in gallery select image, click "Share" button and choose TextGrabber from the list of applications, the file will be opened in the application in the "Photo" recognition mode.
+ Using 3D Touch on the TextGrabber icon, you can select "Recognize last photo" menu, then this file will be transferred from gallery to application and recognized in the "Photo" mode.

Major changes introduced in past releases:
+ Real-Time Translation can translate to 100+ languages online and 10 languages offline.
Try it now and leave a review in App Store, please! Thank you!

+ Share Extension: while working with image in any app click iOS "Share" button, and choose TextGrabber from the list of applications, the file will be opened in TextGrabber in the "Photo" recognition mode.
+ Using 3D Touch on the TextGrabber icon, you can select "Recognize last photo" menu, then this file will be transferred from gallery to application and recognized in the "Photo" mode.

Major changes introduced in past releases:
+ Real-Time Translation can translate to 100+ languages online and 10 languages offline.
Try it now and leave a review in App Store, please! Thank you!

TextGrabber is now fully compatible with iOS 12 and can easily understand Siri voice commands. To add "Recognize last photo" command: Go to iPhone settings > Siri and Search > Suggested Shortcuts, tap "+". Then record this command with your voice and it will be added to "My Shortcuts".
To activate the command, simply tell Siri: "Recognize last photo" and it will open it in the “Photo" recognition mode in TextGrabber.

You can write us on the App Store and share your experiences with TextGrabber, Siri, and iOS 12.
Your feedback is highly appreciated and will help us to improve our products and services.

+ Improved interface for the new iPad Pro.
+ Performance tuning and stability improvement.
The most important in previous releases:
+ Added various options for activating a premium account.
+ Revamped translation technology: formatting and paragraphs are preserved; translation quality has improved.
+ iOS 12 and Siri Shortcuts support.
If you enjoy TextGrabber, would you mind taking a moment to write a review on the App Store? We’d greatly appreciate it.

We have changed the app icon to celebrate the 10 years anniversary of our apps!
TextGrabber, FineScanner, and Business Card Reader are now indispensable digitizing assets for over 10 million people across the globe. Join our celebration and stay tuned! More cool features are coming soon!
If you enjoy TextGrabber, please leave a review on the App Store. Thanks!

We updated the VoiceOver feature and TextGrabber is now easier to operate for visually impaired users.
With this feature, you can have a phone screen read, including buttons, icons, links, and other interface elements, and use gestures to navigate and select their options.
To enable this feature go to the Accessibility tab and choose VoiceOver.
The most important in previous releases:
+TextGrabber is now fully compatible with iOS 13
